result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marvin Antonio Antonio-Espinoza

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on December 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Case called: 9:38 a.m. 
Clerk: Heather.      
Defendant appears in person, pro se. Interpreter Sally Nichols appears via Zoom. 

Interpreter sworn in and interprets. 

Defendant has contact SPD and does not qualify.  
Defendant sworn in and testifies. 
COURT questions defendant re: employment/income;
Court finds defendant indigent;
COURT appoints Atty Travis Slattery @ $100/hr not to exceed $1,200.00 w/o further order;

Dates to remain.

Adjourned: 9:49 a.m.

Indigency hearing on October 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on October 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: No contact with victim(s): M.S.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Police escort to retrieve personal property from residence (Marathon CO Sheriff).

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:48 p.m. 
State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Heather Roehr, in person; Interpreter Laura Salcido appears via Zoom.

Interpreter sworn in and interprets.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived. 
PLEA: NOT GUILTY on CM's.

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 signature bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): M.S.
- Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence (Marathon CO Sheriff). 

DATES:
IH: 10/6/22 @ 9:30 a.m. 
PTC w/JA: 10/27/22 @ 10:00 a.m. 

Adjourned: 2:57 p.m.
